name: @bust/timer
description: Just a li'l timer object to track and report on the passage of time
author: Busticated

scripts.version: npm run changelog:update && npm run docs:build
scripts.test: npm run build && NODE_V8_COVERAGE=tmp/coverage node --test --test-reporter spec --experimental-test-coverage --enable-source-maps dist/esm/*.test.js
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:build:api && npm run docs:build:readme
scripts.docs:build:api: typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --hideBreadcrumbs true --githubPages false --sourceLinkTemplate '/{path}#L{line}' --readme none src/index.ts
